external_games.name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Lost Zero
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Lost Zero

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Lost Zero
summary: Square Enix released Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Lost Zero RPG for both the Android and iOS devices. The game features easy tap and flick battle controls, CCG character system, voice overs, story mode, scenarios, and more!
